tool_description: Calculates return on investment for pricing decisions by comparing revenue gains against implementation costs and investments.

revenue_increase.description: Revenue increase attributed to pricing decision

implementation_costs.description: Total costs incurred to implement pricing changes

operational_cost_change.description: Change in operational costs due to pricing decision

time_period_months.description: Time period in months for ROI calculation

error_messages: Invalid revenue increase: Must be a numeric value, can be negative for revenue decreases.
Invalid implementation costs: Must be a positive number representing actual costs incurred.
Invalid time period: Must be between 1 and 60 months for meaningful ROI calculation.
Division by zero: Implementation costs cannot be zero for ROI calculation.
usage: Input revenue_increase from attribution analysis and implementation_costs for the pricing initiative. Optionally specify operational_cost_change and time_period_months for accurate ROI calculation.

roi_percentage.description: Return on investment as a percentage

payback_period_months.description: Time in months to recover the initial investment

net_profit.description: Net profit after accounting for all costs

roi_category.description: ROI performance category: excellent, good, moderate, or poor
